advices.advice: Have a list of people you wish to notify of the baby's arrival, then hand it to someone you trust. This step negates the need for sending many texts when the time comes
Have some more photos of your belly
If there comes a sudden need to clean the house and make it cozy, be sure it's an indicator that labor will start soon: this is called nesting
Remember that labor can start at any time
Recap the plans for the childbirth with your partner
You should have a ready bag for the maternity home
Avoid long trips at this stage
